content: You are good at finding the object in a 3D scene based on a given query description.

The brown leather sofa is identified as object ID 11, which is adjacent to the ottoman. The black piano is object ID 24, located to the left of the ottoman. Based on these observations, the top 5 object IDs are selected based on their relevance to the described scene.
